channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DHS launches immigration crackdowns in Chicago, Boston
item.description: These announcements by DHS are just the latest escalation of federal action in U.S. cities like Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. — all led by Democrat...

item.title: This is what could happen to a child who doesn't get vaccinated
item.description: An estimated 14 million kids don't get any vaccines. They face serious threats from measles, diarrhea, pneumonia and more.

item.title: Murdoch Family Puts Lachlan in Control, Resolving Succession Fight

item.title: After 6 years, Hollow Knight Silksong is here at last — and it was worth the wait

item.title: France's government collapses after the prime minister loses a confidence vote
item.description: Legislators toppled France's government in a confidence vote, a new crisis for Europe's second-largest economy. Prime Minister François Bayrou was ous...

item.title: Trump Administration Says It Has Begun Immigration Crackdown in Chicago
item.description: In Chicago, advocates for immigrants said they saw several arrests on Sunday, but were uncertain of the scale of federal action.

item.title: The Murdoch Succession Fight Is Over. So What Does Lachlan Control?
item.description: From Fox News to Tubi to HarperCollins, here’s what is in the media empire that Rupert Murdoch built.

item.title: Supreme Court Lifts Restrictions on L.A. Immigration Stops
item.description: A federal judge had ordered agents not to make indiscriminate stops relying on factors like a person’s ethnicity or that they speak Spanish.

item.title: Gunmen Attack Bus Stop in Jerusalem, Killing at Least 6
item.description: The Israeli police described the shooting as a terrorist attack and said that the perpetrators had been killed at the scene.

item.title: 19 Killed in Nepal ‘Gen Z’ Protests Over Social Media Ban and Corruption
item.description: The government retreated from the ban amid anger over violent dispersal of demonstrators protesting graft, inequality and social media controls.
